headline: Is Charles River Laboratories (CRL) Pricing Reflect Recent Gains And Drug Discovery Contract Momentum
summary: If you are wondering whether Charles River Laboratories International is reasonably priced at around US$219.70, you are not alone; many investors are asking whether the recent share price lines up with the underlying worth of the business. The stock has returned 12.1% over the last 30 days, 8.5% year to date and 34.4% over the past year, while the 3 year and 5 year returns of a 9.7% decline and a 21.6% decline show a mixed longer term picture.
